note.query: SELECT CASE y.monthkey WHEN convert(varchar(6),getdate(),112) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS 'HighRecord' FROM ( SELECT monthkey,row_number() over(order by monthsale desc) as rid FROM ( select left(Calendar_DT,6) monthkey,sum(sales_amt) monthsale from [dm].Fct_YH_Sales_Inventory group by left(Calendar_DT,6) )x)y WHERE y.rid=1
note.title: [Notification] YH月销售额创新高
note.body: #### YH本月销售额，创月销售记录新高！ 快去看一看把~ ![screenshot](http://sc.jb51.net/uploads/allimg/130814/2-130Q42233520-L.jpg) [查看YH报表](https://app.powerbi.com/view?r=eyJrIjoiZjk4NGMwNDUtMDY4YS00NDNhLThmZjctY2VlMjQ4ODBkZDFhIiwidCI6IjI3ODEyMTk1LTg3YWItNGI1ZS05YmU2LTBiOWZmNTYwNWYzZiIsImMiOjh9)
